message: I'd like to start with a fair and generous split, hoping we can reach an agreement quickly.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more considering my skills and contributions. Your turn to improve the offer!
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's end this negotiation with a fair deal for both of us.
I'm still not satisfied with the offer. I think I can get a better deal. You're getting a good chunk of the money, but I'm willing to give you a chance to improve the offer.
I'm making a final concession, but I won't go lower. Let's reach an agreement before the value of our shares drops further.
